data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Giovani Lo Celso gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tottenham.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Andre Marriner signals a Tottenham throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Free kick Tottenham.
In the minute 6, Heung Min Son of Tottenham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Andre Marriner awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Tottenham.
In the minute 8, Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Tottenham have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Crystal Palace capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tottenham's half?
In the minute 11, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Goal! Harry Kane gives Tottenham a 0-1 lead in London.
In the minute 13, Giovani Lo Celso with an assist there.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 15, James McArthur (Crystal Palace) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Crystal Palace's Andros Townsend breaks free at Selhurst Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
In the minute 16, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
Andre Marriner signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Tottenham's half.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, James McCarthy is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
Harry Winks (Tottenham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 23, Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Crystal Palace, close to Tottenham's area.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Jeffrey Schlupp of Crystal Palace smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 28, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Crystal Palace just outside Tottenham's area.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 31, Andre Marriner awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Tottenham push forward at Selhurst Park and Ben Davies gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Crystal Palace defence.
Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Joel Ward's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Tottenham have a goal kick.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 36, Crystal Palace are coming forward and Cheikhou Kouyate gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Wilfried Zaha for Crystal Palace gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 37, Andre Marriner signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Andre Marriner will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 45, Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 47, Tottenham's Toby Alderweireld misses with an attempt on goal.
Andre Marriner awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 49, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Crystal Palace's Tyrick Mitchell has been booked in London.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Tottenham have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in London.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 51, Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 53, Jeffrey Schlupp gets an equalizer for Crystal Palace. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Jordan Ayew to set up the goal.
Andre Marriner signals a Tottenham throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 56, In London, Scott Dann (Crystal Palace) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Free kick Tottenham.
In London Tottenham attack through Lucas Moura. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 60, Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Jose Mourinho is making the team's first substitution at Selhurst Park with Steven Bergwijn replacing Giovani Lo Celso.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Andre Marriner blows against Crystal Palace's Andros Townsend for offside.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
At Selhurst Park, Toby Alderweireld has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 62, Crystal Palace's Scott Dann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham close to the penalty box.
In the minute 64, Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 66, Free kick Crystal Palace.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In the minute 71, Jairo Riedewald is replacing James McArthur for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Tottenham at Selhurst Park.
Cheikhou Kouyate (Crystal Palace) has received a yellow card from Andre Marriner.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Crystal Palace are coming forward and Jordan Ayew gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 79, Attention is being given to Tottenhamâ€™s Moussa Sissoko and play has been suspended briefly.
It seems as if Moussa Sissoko is unable to continue. Dele Alli replaces him for the away team.
Jose Mourinho (Tottenham) is making a third substitution, with Oliver Skipp replacing Heung Min Son.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andre Marriner waits before resuming play because Jordan Ayew for Crystal Palace is still down.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Tottenham.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Luka Milivojevic is on a sub for Jeffrey Schlupp for Crystal Palace.
In the minute 86, Jordan Ayew returns to the field for Crystal Palace after picking up a slight injury.
Andre Marriner signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Tottenham's half.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
In London Crystal Palace attack through Scott Dann. The finish is off target, however.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Eric Dier (Tottenham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Lucas Moura with Davinson Sanchez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
